CustomField.description: ** System Calculated ** Link to the customer record.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(OrderApi__Entity__c,"Account"), HYPERLINK("/" & OrderApi__Account__r.Id, OrderApi__Account__r.Name, ""), HYPERLINK("/" & OrderApi__Contact__r.Id, OrderApi__Contact__r.FirstName & " " & OrderApi__Contact__r.LastName, ""))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: **System Calculated** A link to the record the system considers the "Customer" as determined by the "Entity" field.
